Knowledge Article:
Issues:
PRs:

---

### What is this issue?
This is a bridge issue to provide a backlink to an issue/PR from a Knowledge Article (aka KB article).
It provides visibility of an inbound link from the github issue/pr which can be followed to see any knowledge article that is referencing the issue or kb.

### How do I see the knowledge article?
For more info see:
- https://www.elastic.co/blog/elastic-knowledge-center-support-hub
- https://discuss.elastic.co/t/dec-22nd-2024-en-how-to-access-elastic-knowledge-inside-support-hub/371965
